title: vandal skins question
body:
will the vandal skins ever be in the shop?  ive only been playing for about a year but havent seen them yet.

also, what is the vandal skin line referring to? (kinda like star gaurdian is refference to magical girls and dark star is refference to eldrich monsters)

replies.body: I know for a fact Vandal Twitch is just buyable in the shop and i think the rest might be too.
twitches only available skins are fangster and pickpocket.  i dont think any vandal skins are in shop right now. i was hoping they would be available for the halloween sale
